biotools.summary: This package is dedicated to memory efficient genome browsing strategies (both in scripts and interactive sessions) using the R scripting language. It includes classes and functions to manipulate genomic tracks, and a higher level interactive genome browser.

bioschemas.name: Rgb
bioschemas.summary: This package is dedicated to memory efficient genome browsing strategies (both in scripts and interactive sessions) using the R scripting language. It includes classes and functions to manipulate genomic tracks, and a higher level interactive genome browser.
